programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: An emergency room doctor is sued for malpractice after she ignored direct orders to save one near-death patient in favor of helping another who was also critically injured.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull and Benny mount a difficult federal trial defense for a young mother accused of aiding and abetting her extremist husband in an act of domestic terrorism; Benny's commitment to TAC complicates his burgeoning political career.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull heads to federal court for a client accused of stealing his own scientific research from the company he works for, a corporation he says buried his groundbreaking work because selling medication is more profitable than curing diseases.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull uses the First Amendment's freedom of speech to defend a controversial news commentator blamed for a man's suicide after she accused him on air of murder.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Izzy asks Bull to petition the court to have her best friend's body exhumed when the woman's son alleges she was murdered, despite her death already ruled accidental.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby investigates an assassination threat against a Conservative leadership frontrunner.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Michelle investigate a suspicious homicide.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby is brought in to investigate some corrupt cops, but finds himself in over his head when one of them ends up dead from a suspected drug overdose.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: An imprisoned criminal mastermind holds the key to the whereabouts of a kidnapped judge.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: When Michelle and Dev investigate the suspicious death of a CSIS agent, the IIB uncovers a breach of classified intelligence.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A routine trip to the hospital leads a wealthy businessman to lose his baby daughter after his SUV is hijacked.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A break in a six-month cyber crime investigation leads Michelle and Dev to pursue a reckless hacker.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: Toby and Oz are taken hostage by two men posing as security guards when they are dispatched to a routine call in the financial district.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A celebrated restaurant chef is a star witness in the trial of a mob boss charged with shooting his business partner.

programme.title: The Listener
programme.desc: A sex tape featuring the Minister of Foreign Affairs goes viral.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: The LAPD interrupts the team's Christmas celebration to arrest Mac for terrorism when they find a body in a building destroyed by a bomb Mac built.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Mac's nemesis rigs Mac's house with explosives and traps him and Jack inside, Mac uses a karaoke mic and an audio transformer to let the team know that the bomb is a distraction for a bigger one.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac participates in a challenge to create robotic combat machines; Mac must help a competitor when her vehicle is hacked and heads for the Pentagon; Jack attends his high school reunion.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: The team heads to New Orleans to track down a con artist posing as the wife of one of Jack's old CIA aliases; enemies of his old alias resurface looking for revenge.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: One of Murdoc's assassins agrees to hand over Murdoc to MacGyver in exchange for $10 million; the team finds itself protecting Murdoc from a former mentor who wants him dead; Jack realizes he may still have feelings for Riley's mother.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: The team members pose as honeymoon couples at a resort in an attempt to befriend the son of a Serbian war criminal; Bozer wonders if Matty knows about his relationship with Leanna; Jack recruits Elwood to help him break into Matty's home.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac, Jack and Riley set out to find a mobster-turned-informant after he's kidnapped and taken to Chernobyl by an international crime boss; Bozer struggles to keep a secret from Matty.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and the team reunite with the Coltons, a family of bounty hunters, as they all search for a thief of classified intelligence.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: As Mac and the team investigate the suspicious death of Dawn's CIA supervisor, the evidence leads to a dirty CIA agent and a massive counterfeiting ring.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack attempt to rescue a billionaire's son after he is kidnapped by a former Navy SEAL.
